did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Seventh Day Baptist Church of Scott records, 1808-1927.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Seventh Day Baptist Church of Scott (N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One volume containing the records of "the first Baptist Church of Christ in Preble." Two volumes containing records of the Scott Seventh Day Baptist Society. Two volumes containing records of the Sabbath Baptist Church of Scott.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One volume containing the records of "the first Baptist Church of Christ in Preble" including a membership list of the founding members, minutes (1808-1833), baptismal register (1828-1832), membership lists, church articles of faith and practice and church covenant. Two volumes containing records of the Scott Seventh Day Baptist Society including trustee meeting minutes (1831-1883), lists of male members belonging to the Society (1831, 1837); meeting minutes (1882-1918,1927). Two volumes containing records of the Sabbath Baptist Church of Scott containing treasurers' records (1833-1847), lists of members and their yearly apportionments; church meeting minutes (1834-1850), declaration of faith, articles of faith, church covenant, list of members with baptism dates and death and dismissal information to 1913.
